attributes.action: arther and nala get there weekend naps back
attributes.additional_details: It was a sad day when Arther, a young and upcoming film maker and part time teacher and hhis cat, nala lost there rights to have a nap on the weekends. This horrible rule was created by his girlfriend to make him help tidy the living room on a sleepy Sunday afternoon. Please help. this poor man and his cat. NO SWEEPING MORE SLEEPING
